page.title: 10WOODGREEN FARM STOURPORT
page.content: {HOUSE:}350 years old,if grandson lives there it will be {7th}generation of the family. {FARM:}Divided into two sections;{beef {cattle / dairy cattle,}beef cattle: {Murray Grey,Belgian Blue},dairy cattle :{Jersey.}250 beef cattle,50 _ 60 dairy cattle.{Horses:}25,all Arabs. {Other Animals:}4 dogs,2 pigs ,3 peacocks and a few Highland cattle,for show only. {LAND: 250 acres } {FOOD FOR ANIMALS:_} Horses And Cows: {Oats,bran,mash,cake, {grass and hay.} Pigs:{Skim off milk only. Peacocks:{Grain. Dogs:{Dogfood. Buyers of Cattle:{Queen Elizabeth II, {President of Brazil.
